class.name: Image
class.description: Native image datatype. Contains image data, which can be converted to a [Texture], and several functions to interact with it. The maximum width and height for an [code]Image[/code] is 16384 pixels.

method.name: blend_rect
method.description: Alpha-blends [code]src_rect[/code] from [code]src[/code] image to this image at coordinates [code]dest[/code].

method.name: blend_rect_mask
method.description: Alpha-blends [code]src_rect[/code] from [code]src[/code] image to this image using [code]mask[/code] image at coordinates [code]dst[/code]. Alpha channels are required for both [code]src[/code] and [code]mask[/code]. [code]dst[/code] pixels and [code]src[/code] pixels will blend if the corresponding mask pixel's alpha value is not 0. [code]src[/code] image and [code]mask[/code] image [b]must[/b] have the same size (width and height) but they can have different formats.

method.name: blit_rect
method.description: Copies [code]src_rect[/code] from [code]src[/code] image to this image at coordinates [code]dst[/code].

method.name: blit_rect_mask
method.description: Blits [code]src_rect[/code] area from [code]src[/code] image to this image at the coordinates given by [code]dst[/code]. [code]src[/code] pixel is copied onto [code]dst[/code] if the corresponding [code]mask[/code] pixel's alpha value is not 0. [code]src[/code] image and [code]mask[/code] image [b]must[/b] have the same size (width and height) but they can have different formats.

method.name: clear_mipmaps
method.description: Removes the image's mipmaps.

method.name: compress
method.description: Compresses the image to use less memory. Can not directly access pixel data while the image is compressed. Returns error if the chosen compression mode is not available. See [code]COMPRESS_*[/code] constants.

method.name: convert
method.description: Converts the image's format. See [code]FORMAT_*[/code] constants.

method.name: copy_from
method.description: Copies [code]src[/code] image to this image.

method.name: create
method.description: Creates an empty image of given size and format. See [code]FORMAT_*[/code] constants. If [code]use_mipmaps[/code] is true then generate mipmaps for this image. See the [code]generate_mipmaps[/code] method.

method.name: create_from_data
method.description: Creates a new image of given size and format. See [code]FORMAT_*[/code] constants. Fills the image with the given raw data. If [code]use_mipmaps[/code] is true then generate mipmaps for this image. See the [code]generate_mipmaps[/code] method.

method.name: crop
method.description: Crops the image to the given [code]width[/code] and [code]height[/code]. If the specified size is larger than the current size, the extra area is filled with black pixels.

method.name: decompress
method.description: Decompresses the image if it is compressed. Returns an error if decompress function is not available.

method.name: detect_alpha
method.description: Returns ALPHA_BLEND if the image has data for alpha values. Returns ALPHA_BIT if all the alpha values are below a certain threshold or the maximum value. Returns ALPHA_NONE if no data for alpha values is found.

method.name: expand_x2_hq2x
method.description: Stretches the image and enlarges it by a factor of 2. No interpolation is done.

method.name: fill
method.description: Fills the image with a given [Color].

method.name: fix_alpha_edges
method.description: Blends low-alpha pixels with nearby pixels.

method.name: flip_x
method.description: Flips the image horizontally.

method.name: flip_y
method.description: Flips the image vertically.

method.name: generate_mipmaps
method.description: Generates mipmaps for the image. Mipmaps are pre-calculated and lower resolution copies of the image. Mipmaps are automatically used if the image needs to be scaled down when rendered. This improves image quality and the performance of the rendering. Returns an error if the image is compressed, in a custom format or if the image's width/height is 0.

method.name: get_data
method.description: Returns the image's raw data.

method.name: get_format
method.description: Returns the image's raw data.

method.name: get_height
method.description: Returns the image's height.

method.name: get_mipmap_offset
method.description: Returns the offset where the image's mipmap with index [code]mipmap[/code] is stored in the [code]data[/code] dictionary.

method.name: get_pixel
method.description: Returns the color of the pixel at [code](x, y)[/code] if the image is locked. If the image is unlocked it always returns a [Color] with the value [code](0, 0, 0, 1.0)[/code].

method.name: get_rect
method.description: Returns a new image that is a copy of the image's area specified with [code]rect[/code].

method.name: get_size
method.description: Returns the image's size (width and height).

method.name: get_used_rect
method.description: Returns a [Rect2] enclosing the visible portion of the image.

method.name: get_width
method.description: Returns the image's width.

method.name: has_mipmaps
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the image has generated mipmaps.

method.name: is_compressed
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the image is compressed.

method.name: is_empty
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the image has no data.

method.name: is_invisible
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if all the image's pixels have an alpha value of 0. Returns [code]false[/code] if any pixel has an alpha value higher than 0.

method.name: load
method.description: Loads an image from file [code]path[/code].

method.name: lock
method.description: Locks the data for writing access.

method.name: normalmap_to_xy
method.description: Converts the image's data to represent coordinates on a 3D plane. This is used when the image represents a normalmap. A normalmap can add lots of detail to a 3D surface without increasing the polygon count.

method.name: premultiply_alpha
method.description: Multiplies color values with alpha values. Resulting color values for a pixel are [code](color * alpha)/256[/code].

method.name: resize
method.description: Resizes the image to the given [code]width[/code] and [code]height[/code]. New pixels are calculated using [code]interpolation[/code]. See [code]interpolation[/code] constants.

method.name: resize_to_po2
method.description: Resizes the image to the nearest power of 2 for the width and height. If [code]square[/code] is [code]true[/code] then set width and height to be the same.

method.name: save_png
method.description: Saves the image as a PNG file to [code]path[/code].

method.name: set_pixel
method.description: Sets the [Color] of the pixel at [code](x, y)[/code] if the image is locked. Example: [codeblock] var img = Image.new() img.lock() img.set_pixel(x, y, color) # Works img.unlock() img.set_pixel(x, y, color) # Does not have an effect [/codeblock]

method.name: shrink_x2
method.description: Shrinks the image by a factor of 2.

method.name: srgb_to_linear
method.description: Converts the raw data from the sRGB colorspace to a linear scale.

method.name: unlock
method.description: Unlocks the data and prevents changes.

members.member: Holds all of the image's color data in a given format. See [code]FORMAT_*[/code] constants.
